game

Class Consts

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Consts

  • public class Consts
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where constants and variable globals are saved for organizing.
    Since:
    2015-04-24
    Version:
    2015-04-28
    Author:
    Spencer Davis, Josh Kepros, Josh McDermott, Chris Swanson

      • SCALE

        public static final int SCALE
        Scale of the graphical representation of the JBox2D world for conversion. The JBox2D world is 100x100 meters, and the corresponding area is SCALExSCALE pixels.
        See Also:
